Text: add `intent.setFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);` before starting the activity. you need to set this Flag whenever you are trying to switch to an Activity but your origin place is not an Activity itself.

add `intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);` before starting the activity. you need to set this Flag whenever you are trying to switch to an Activity but your origin place is not an Activity itself.
